info.name: Farmer
info.description: Farmer background from the Player’s Handbook 2024.
info.author: Wizards of the Coast

ul.li: Skill Proficiencies: Animal Handling and Nature
Equipment: Choose A or B: (A) Sickle, Carpenter's Tools, Healer's Kit, Iron Pot, Shovel, Traveler's Clothes, 30GP; or (B) 50 GP

description.p: You grew up close to the land. Years tending animals and cultivating the earth rewarded you with patience and good health. You have a keen appreciation for nature's bounty alongside a healthy respect for nature's wrath.

setters.set: Strength, Constitution, Wisdom, Tough Feat, Animal Handling and Nature Skills, Carpenter's Tools
